For Journalists






About Sonoma State
Sonoma State University is a campus of 9,400 students located in California's premier wine country, one hour north of San Francisco. With a tradition of promoting intellectual and personal growth, leadership opportunities and technological proficiency, the liberal arts and sciences university offers its students a friendly, safe and informal atmosphere on a beautiful campus setting. Currently, campus housing accommodates students in both apartment and residential suite style facilities. Read more about Sonoma State University.
Media Contact
For media inquiries, please contact Rob Eyler, interim PIO.
